greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Values in A054973 larger than 1.
comment: This is a survey of how many solutions the equation sigma(x)=k has for k in A159886, or about the lengths of the plateaus in A007609.
link: Jean-François Alcover, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1095
maple: for i from 1 to 1000 do if op(i,a054973) > 1 then printf("%d,", op(i,a054973)) ; fi; od: # _R. J. Mathar_, May 22 2009
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Apr 27 2009
ext: Edited and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, May 22 2009
